title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.1 - Background investigations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.1 - Background investigations

State Regulations

Each prospective employee, officer or director of a
corporation identified as such, shall be the subject of a background
investigation by the corporation prior to his employment, appointment or
retention. Such information shall be made available to the commission at the
commission's request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4407.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
